home_description: I'm more of a solutionist than a critic. Unhinged ideas come naturally.  I'll dump my personal thoughts here. I think about fundamental aspects of people and society, specifically politics and societal systems with touches of solutions sprinkled throughout. I also like thinking about highly glorified status symbols and why people should be looking in other directions. I also post unhinged thoughts in my daily life.
about_description: Andrew Chen Wang's Personal Political, Unhinged, Human Dynamic Blog. I'm unfiltered with a background in the tech industry. I like helping people, sometimes to my detriment, but I find it fun.
